MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int16 ReverseBytes(int16 i) cil managed

Docs.param: the value whose bytes are to be reversed
Docs.summary: Returns the value obtained by reversing the order of the bytes in the two's complement representation of the specified short value.
Docs.returns: the value obtained by reversing (or, equivalently, swapping) the bytes in the specified short value.
